featured.text: Soon, it can lead to dizziness, nausea, and vomiting.
You can also take medicine before your ride to avoid or reduce nausea and vomiting.

definition.zh_def: 嘔吐，將胃中的內容物排出體外。
definition.en_def: To expel the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
definition.example: After eating too much candy, he felt sick and had to vomit.
